title: Beyond curtains = Ni scene ni coulisses (TEFC)
creator_credit: Denis Poulin, Marc Beaudet and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Three dancers move through abstract motions. Sometimes they move against backgrounds, sometimes they incorporate Electro-accoustical music which further heightens the other worldly atmosphere of this experimental dance film.
creator_credit_for_label: Denis Poulin, Marc Beaudet and National Film Board of Canada
description: Three dancers move through abstract motions. Sometimes they move against backgrounds, sometimes they incorporate Electro-accoustical music which further heightens the other worldly atmosphere of this experimental dance film.
